OrgName: TRG Customer Solutions d/b/a IBEX Global Solutions, Inc.
activities: Our organization is in the business process outsourcing business (BPO) and performs a variety of work on behalf of our clients including making outbound telemarketing and survey calls, handling inbound calls for a variety of purposes, as well as other business activities such as data entry, handling e-mails, and web-based requests for information.  TRG collects personal information from customers on behalf of our clients and stores this data in the US in our data centers.  This personal data is the sole property of our clients, and TRG does not own or control any of the data.
recoursemech: TRG will use the ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor program as our independent recourse mechanism for dispute resolution.
